## snakeCase() function

snake\_case converts from PascalCase or camelCase to snake\_case

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function snakeCase(string: string): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  string | <code>string</code> | string |

<b>Returns:</b>
